table.name: vtiger_tickets
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_tickets` ( `ticketsid` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `ticketsno` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `tksticketname` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `tickets_tkstickettype` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `tksdescription` varchar(250) DEFAULT NULL, `tksamountavailable` varchar(25) DEFAULT NULL, `tksticketprice` decimal(25,2) DEFAULT NULL, `tkschannels` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `tksstartdate` date DEFAULT NULL, `tksenddate` date DEFAULT NULL, `tksticketowner` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `tksevent` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `tickets_tksmembershiptype` varchar(255) DEFAULT '' ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_ticketscf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_ticketscf` ( `ticketsid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`ticketsid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
